rooms.description: Main entrance with Vastu aligned reception area.
Large open space for gatherings, adheres to Vastu by placing seating in the south-east direction.
Adjacent to the kitchen, optimally placed according to Vastu guidelines for meals and light.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout, placed in the north-west zone per Vastu for auspicious cooking area.
Serene reading room located in the quietest corner of the ground floor, placed in the north-east to promote knowledge and tranquility.
Private living space for staff with essential amenities.

openings.description: Large window to allow abundant natural light

utilities.description: Outdoor swimming pool integrated into the design with safety and privacy features.
Central courtyard for relaxation, designed according to Vastu principles for harmonious energy flow.

additional_features.description: Design incorporates irregular plot geometry by aligning main structures along the most stable and auspicious lines.
Complementing two-story layout with a well-balanced ground floor plan.
